________________________________
From: gunan <notifications@github.com>
Sent: Friday, July 28, 2017 8:56 PM
To: tensorflow/tensorflow
Cc: Shirish (Sam) Ranade; Author
Subject: Re: [tensorflow/tensorflow] Looks like a bug tensorflow 1.2.1 with gpu error during basic_gpu_test (#11817)


To check if my GPU is working or not, I like to use tf.test.is_gpu_available() method.
This only checks if the GPU is accessible. The computations are still best checked by unit tests.

—
You are receiving this because you authored the thread.

body:
Thank you sir !

Will try that out !!

Bye for now,
Shirish


________________________________
From: gunan <notifications@github.com>
Sent: Friday, July 28, 2017 8:56 PM
To: tensorflow/tensorflow
Cc: Shirish (Sam) Ranade; Author
Subject: Re: [tensorflow/tensorflow] Looks like a bug tensorflow 1.2.1 with gpu error during basic_gpu_test (#11817)


To check if my GPU is working or not, I like to use tf.test.is_gpu_available() method.
This only checks if the GPU is accessible. The computations are still best checked by unit tests.

—
